definition[0]: a flat piece of plastic, metal, or wood, with raised edges, used for carrying things such as plates, food etc
example[0]: The waiter brought drinks on a tray.
definition[1]: a flat open container with three sides used for holding papers, documents etc on a desk
note[0]: out tray (=for holding documents you have dealt with)
definition[2]: a flat open container with four sides used for holding certain things
note[1]: seed tray (=a tray in which you plant seeds)
